title: CleanFlow (CF) – Room Organization & Cleaning Guidelines
subtitle: "A place for everything, and everything in its place" 🧼✨

fundamentals.title: Fundamental Principles
items: A place for everything, and everything in its place.
Order saves time and creates inner peace.
Clean environment = clear mind = open heart.
Daily routine of 5-10 minutes of tidying.
fundamentals.tip: Tip: Establish a "return point" for every item 🧭

daily.title: Daily Actions
items: Make the bed immediately after waking up 🛏️
Clothes: to closet/laundry basket 🧺
Clear desk of unnecessary surfaces 🧼
Daily trash disposal 🗑️
Ventilate the room at least once a day 💨

weekly.title: Weekly Actions
items: Thorough floor cleaning: corner to corner 🧹
Clean shelves/windows/doors 🪟
Clothes sorting: fold / donate / discard 👕
Energy refresh: good scent/music 🌿
weekly.note: Note: Set a fixed day of the week for general "Reset".

organization.title: Item Organization
items: Storage by categories: technology / clothes / papers / hobbies
Numbered boxes/drawers + labels 🏷️
Clear tagging (name/color/icon) for each box
90-day rule: not in use? consider donation/disposal ⏳

mental.title: Mental Rules
items: Don't go to sleep when the room is messy 🌙
Start the day in a clean and organized room 🌞
Physical cleanliness attracts inner cleanliness 🕊️
The room is a mirror of consciousness – order inside and out 🪞

goldenMinutes.title: "3 Golden Minutes" – Every Entry
items: Locate an item that's not in its place
Return it to its return point
Bring in light/air: open window or good scent

motivation.title: Motivational Quote
motivation.text: If you don't control your environment – your environment controls you. Turn your room into a small sanctuary of peace and light 🕯️

footer.verse: "And thy camp shall be holy" (Deuteronomy 23:15) – An organized room attracts holiness, calm and joy.
